name: BMW M8
description: The price of BMW M8, a 4 seater Coupe, starts from  of Rs. 2.44 Crore. It is available in 1 variant, with an engine of 4395 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. M8 comes with 6 airbags. BMW M8 has a ground clearance of 130 mm  and is available in 9 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 8.77 kmpl for M8.
